attributes.action: give tax breaks to people looking after elderly relatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many of us look after elderly relatives rather than put them into council accomodation? Surely this is saving the council and the government millions as it is cheaper than providing them with housing. We would like a slice of it back, especially as the council tax goes up depending on the number of people living in the house.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
